backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing user profiles, access control, messaging, and blob storage with authorization checks and map-based state.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding a new deletedMessageIds map while preserving existing globalMessages state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like list of short summaries describing the responsibility of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variable definitions for light and dark UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root element and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/README.md: Project overview and documentation covering features, tech stack, setup, and usage details.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup flow, and rendering the main app layout.
Route guard component that restricts admin pages based on backend admin status and local unlock state.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Renders the top header with logo, profile button, logout, and an admin unlock dialog triggered by a hidden password.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Controls app-wide layout, sidebar behavior, and navigation between views including admin access after unlock.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPicker.tsx: Handles avatar file selection, validation, upload with progress tracking, and triggers avatar update.
Provides UI for composing messages with text and optional image attachments, including upload progress and send handling.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Displays chat messages with sender info, timestamps, attachment handling, and long-press delete for the sender's own messages.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Collects initial user profile data and saves a new profile tied to the user's identity.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Renders navigation links and conditionally shows the admin panel link when the user is an admin and the session is unlocked.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Renders a user avatar with size variants, falling back to initials or a default image if no avatar URL is available.
frontend/src/components/UserListItem.tsx: Displays a user entry with avatar, display info, presence status, and a button to select or message the user.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides a query to check if the current caller has admin privileges using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUnlock.ts: Manages a session-based admin unlock state stored in sessionStorage with sync across tabs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity restoration on load.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Fetches global messages with polling and provides mutations for sending, updating, and deleting messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching and updating user profiles, including avatar, display name, bio, and online status.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteLogo.ts: Fetches and updates the site logo via the backend actor, falling back to a default logo when none is set.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Provides UI and handlers for uploading site logo and general images with previews and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalChatPage.tsx: Fetches and displays global chat messages with auto‑scrolling and a message composer.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays login UI using Internet Identity and shows the site logo loaded from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits the user's profile including display name, bio, and avatar.
frontend/src/pages/UsersPage.tsx: Lists all user profiles with search and selection capability.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Validates image files for size and type and provides filename extension helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session‑stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the current scaffolded Internet Computer app, listing implemented backend and frontend features including authorization, blob storage, user profiles, chat UI, users listing, and build/deploy configs. Contains structured metadata for each existing feature with IDs, descriptions, and versioning.
